name: DUELEUM
description: DUELEUM is an action game that fights enemies by making full use of magic and sword. Let's survive using various techniques.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows7 + Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 980 Storage: 8 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows7 + Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 Memory: 16 MB RAM Graphics: GTX 1080 Storage: 20 GB available space
